description: Trapped in a failing cabin aboard a derelict spacecraft orbiting a dead planet.

rooms.description: Broken panels flicker erratically. A viewport reveals the planets red storms.
Your cryopod lies shattered. A log recorder blinks with a red light.
Pipes hiss steam. A reactor core pulses weakly in the gloom.

control_panel.name: Control Panel
control_panel.description: A damaged control panel with flickering displays.

use.failureMessage: The panel is too damaged. It needs repairs.

helmet.name: Space Helmet
helmet.description: A cracked but functional EVA helmet.

navigation_console.name: Navigation Console
navigation_console.description: The ship's navigation system, barely operational.

use.failureMessage: The console needs power and proper authorization codes.

cryogenic_pod.name: Cryogenic Pod
cryogenic_pod.description: Your shattered sleeping pod, covered in frost.

use.failureMessage: The cryopod is too damaged to use for sleep, but might serve another purpose.

log_recorder.name: Audio Log Recorder
log_recorder.description: A device holding audio logs from the crew.

reactor_core.name: Reactor Core
reactor_core.description: The ship's failing reactor, pulsing with unstable energy.

use.failureMessage: The reactor is critically unstable. You need tools to work on it safely.

engineering_toolkit.name: Engineering Toolkit
engineering_toolkit.description: A set of tools for ship repairs.

use.successMessage: You open the toolkit and examine the repair tools inside. Everything you need for emergency repairs.
use.failureMessage: The toolkit is ready for use.
